rationale: 'highly pathogenic' is a technical term, not an authorial intensifier on a general risk-adjective.
statement_text: Michigan has lifted a statewide ban on poultry and waterfowl exhibitions after 30 days passed with no new cases of highly pathogenic avian influenza in domestic birds.
